verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: lashed] out [ARG1: at the media] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-CAU: over " vicious " coverage of first lady Melania Trump , who has spent weeks out of the public eye but is " doing really well] , " [ARGM-ADV: according to her husband] .

President Donald Trump lashed out at the media on Wednesday over " vicious " coverage of first lady Melania Trump , who [V: has] spent weeks out of the public eye but is " doing really well , " according to her husband .
